name: DNX.Tasks.GenerateChangeLog
description: Generate a markdown file with all changeset for this build.
helpMarkDown:
Version: 0.1.20  
To use this task **Allow Scripts to Access OAuth Token** has to be enabled in **Options** of this build definition.
author: Kirsten Kluge

inputs.name: OutputFile
inputs.label: Output File
inputs.helpMarkdown: Location and name of the file to write.

inputs.name: CreateMdFile
inputs.label: Create MarkDown File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if you want to generate the Change Log in Markdown format.

inputs.name: IncludeLinks
inputs.label: Links to Commits
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if you want to include links to the commits.

inputs.name: AppendMdFile
inputs.label: Append To .md File
inputs.helpMarkDown: When checked the new contend will be added to an existing file, otherwise the file will be overwritten.

inputs.name: CreateJsonFile
inputs.label: Create JSON File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if you want to generate the Change Log in JSON format.
